Messages.Author: Clara Bachorz
Messages.Content: Dear all,  Unfortunately, as some of you may have noticed, there were some issues with the submission page for the 2nd assignment. Messages.Author: Clara Bachorz
Messages.Content: Dear all, Following yesterday's class, here are a few clarifications on some of the questions: Question 1-b) The capacity increase of 20% is relative to the newly installed capacity. If 400GW was installed during 2023, (400 * 1.2) GW will be installed in 2024, and so on. Question 4-b) You are expected to compare the cost of hydrogen derived in question a) to the cost of using natural gas, considering associated emissions. MWh(H2) and MWh(th) can directly be compared here Let us know if there are any further questions, enjoy the rest of your week ! Clara

Messages.Author: Gunnar Godwin Luderer
Messages.Content: Dear all, as you'll remember, I put up the assignment to read through the "scenario primer" at https://climatescenarios.org/primer/ We won't have the space to cover this today, but will do so next week, June 3rd. Please be prepared to respond to the following questions: How are scenarios different from predictions? What is the difference between projections and pathways? How are socio-economic developments, energy, land and climate change connected? What are response strategies to cope with the climate crisis? Cheers,  Gunnar
